title: How to Share Your Gardening Expertise With wikiHow Readers

steps.headline: Click on one of the articles below, and see if you can fix it up.
steps.description:
Add to it to make it better and more informative. Prepare Soil for a Garden
Revive a Dying Aloe Vera Plant
Plant Roses
Remove Moss

steps.headline: Open any of the above articles and read it.
steps.description: Scroll down to EDIT THIS PAGE and click to open the article so you can add your expertise.

steps.headline: Type in your improvements.
steps.description: Beef up the body of the article. Add a tip in the TIP section. Advise people of possible dangers in the WARNING section or go right ahead and rewrite the entire article; some articles need this. You can even add photos and links to other helpful sites. Just do whatever you can think of to make the article as useful as possible.

steps.headline: Help tidy up the wikiHow Gardening category at  Gardening
Click on the above link and take a look around.
steps.description: Chances are you will find articles which ought to be combined. If so, see the link below about merges' and learn how to merge two lesser articles into a better offering. You may notice that there aren't any articles on certain aspects of plant care so far. Perhaps you can create a new article to address that need.

steps.headline: Suggest new ways of categorizing gardening articles.
steps.description: wikiHow is a collaborative project. You're the gardener. Chances are you might know what to do to make this place great for gardeners like you. wikiHow readers will thank you for your efforts. We are glad you showed up and look forward to seeing your work.

text:
Click on one of the articles below, and see if you can fix it up. Add to it to make it better and more informative. Prepare Soil for a Garden
Revive a Dying Aloe Vera Plant
Plant Roses
Remove Moss Open any of the above articles and read it. Scroll down to EDIT THIS PAGE and click to open the article so you can add your expertise. Type in your improvements. Beef up the body of the article. Add a tip in the TIP section. Advise people of possible dangers in the WARNING section or go right ahead and rewrite the entire article; some articles need this. You can even add photos and links to other helpful sites. Just do whatever you can think of to make the article as useful as possible. Help tidy up the wikiHow Gardening category at  Gardening  Click on the above link and take a look around. Chances are you will find articles which ought to be combined. If so, see the link below about merges' and learn how to merge two lesser articles into a better offering. You may notice that there aren't any articles on certain aspects of plant care so far. Perhaps you can create a new article to address that need. Suggest new ways of categorizing gardening articles. wikiHow is a collaborative project. You're the gardener. Chances are you might know what to do to make this place great for gardeners like you. wikiHow readers will thank you for your efforts. We are glad you showed up and look forward to seeing your work.
